title: 0- Intro to What Trump Can Teach Us About Con Law
description: Welcome to “What Trump Can Teach Us About Con Law"! Every week Roman Mars (99% Invisible) will host a fun, casual Con Law 101 class that uses the tumultuous and erratic activities of the executive branch under Trump to teach us all about the US Constitution.
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
